an5.139:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo na rājāraho hoti na rājabhoggo, na rañño aṅgaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5.139:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ, akkhamo saddānaṃ, akkhamo gandhānaṃ, akkhamo rasānaṃ, akkhamo phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
an5.139:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ?
an5.139:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthikāyaṃ vā disvā assakāyaṃ vā disvā rathakāyaṃ vā disvā pattikāyaṃ vā disvā saṃsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṃ otarituṃ.
an5.139:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ.
an5.139:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti saddānaṃ?
an5.139:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthisaddaṃ vā sutvā assasaddaṃ vā sutvā rathasaddaṃ vā sutvā pattisaddaṃ vā sutvā bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddaṃ vā sutvā saṃsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṃ otarituṃ.
an5.139:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti saddānaṃ.
an5.139:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti gandhānaṃ?
an5.139:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ye te rañño nāgā abhijātā saṅgāmāvacarā tesaṃ muttakarīsassa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā saṃsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṃ otarituṃ.
an5.139:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti gandhānaṃ.
an5.139:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rasānaṃ?
an5.139:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ekissā vā tiṇodakadattiyā vimānito dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā pañcahi vā tiṇodakadattīhi vimānito saṃsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṃ otarituṃ.
an5.139:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rasānaṃ.
an5.139:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṃ?
an5.139:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ekena vā saravegena viddho, dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā pañcahi vā saravegehi viddho saṃsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṃ otarituṃ.
an5.139:9.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
an5.139:10.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo na rājāraho hoti na rājabhoggo na rañño aṅgaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5.139:11.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu na āhuneyyo hoti na pāhuneyyo na dakkhiṇeyyo na añjalikaraṇīyo na anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an5.139:11.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ, akkhamo saddānaṃ, akkhamo gandhānaṃ, akkhamo rasānaṃ, akkhamo phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
an5.139:12.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ?
an5.139:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rajanīye rūpe sārajjati, na sakkoti cittaṃ samādahituṃ.
an5.139:12.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṃ.
an5.139:13.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddānaṃ?
an5.139:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotena saddaṃ sutvā rajanīye sadde sārajjati, na sakkoti cittaṃ samādahituṃ.
an5.139:13.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddānaṃ.
an5.139:14.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhānaṃ?
an5.139:14.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā rajanīye gandhe sārajjati, na sakkoti cittaṃ samādahituṃ.
an5.139:14.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhānaṃ.
an5.139:15.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasānaṃ?
an5.139:15.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā rajanīye rase sārajjati, na sakkoti cittaṃ samādahituṃ.
an5.139:15.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasānaṃ.
an5.139:16.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṃ?
an5.139:16.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā rajanīye phoṭṭhabbe sārajjati, na sakkoti cittaṃ samādahituṃ.
an5.139:16.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
an5.139:17.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na āhuneyyo hoti na pāhuneyyo na dakkhiṇeyyo na añjalikaraṇīyo na anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an5.139:18.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5.139:18.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti rūpānaṃ, khamo saddānaṃ, khamo gandhānaṃ, khamo rasānaṃ, khamo phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.

an5.139:19.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti rūpānaṃ.

an5.139:21.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti gandhānaṃ.

an5.139:22.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti rasānaṃ.
an5.139:23.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṃ?
an5.139:23.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ekena vā saravegena viddho, dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā pañcahi vā saravegehi viddho na saṃsīdati na visīdati, santhambhati sakkoti saṅgāmaṃ otarituṃ.
an5.139:23.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṃ.
